description:
Clean, bright apt. in Elmhurst, Queens. Elmhurst and Jackson Heights have been called the two most diverse area codes in the world. The neighborhood offers incredibly authentic and affordable international food, all within walking distance from the apartment. This is a safe, family oriented, immigrant neighborhood that is authentically New York.

You will have access to the whole apt.

This is a short cab ride away from LaGuardia Airport. Jazz fans will appreciate Louis Armstrong House Museum here in Elmhurst. This also makes a great base from which to head to Citi Field for a Mets game/series.

Close proximity to numerous buses, as well as M, R and 7 trains. E and F trains are also nearby. Short train ride into midtown Manhattan.

Washers and dryers available in basement of building. These machines are not coin-operated. They require the purchase of a card from the machine in the laundry room.
name: Comfortable Stay in Queens
